alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 11:24AM CDT until April 19 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jo Daviess County in northwestern Illinois... Northwestern Jackson County in east central Iowa... Southeastern Dubuque County in northeastern Iowa... Northeastern Jones County in east central Iowa... * Until noon CDT. * At 1124 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Swiss Valley Park to Bernard, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Dubuque, Swiss Valley Park, Key West and Center Grove around 1130 AM CDT. Zwingle, Mines of Spain, Rockdale and Dubuque Regional Airport around 1135 AM CDT. East Dubuque and La Motte around 1140 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include St. Donatus and Massey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
